turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I'd like a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that would be good which location do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Grand Rapids.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ah okay that one has good service okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just get me a vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whichever is the cheapest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: But money isn't a problem to you no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: True get that new big size I forgot what it was called.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh the trenta that sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes the big gulp of starbucks basically.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay do you want milk added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No sugar please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get a drink for yourself as well on me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whatever you want enjoy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When will my drink be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Were on the way to starbucks on Main Avenue now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 15 Minutes.
